responsibilities_section:
The department develops software and systems for observation and surveillance.
Camera systems and other sensors, such as radars, are radars, for example, are
intelligently interconnected and their data processed for the user. The designed,
distributed software architectures support low-end hardware as well as high-
availability, high-end server systems and cover requirements from real-time to
redundancy and automation to intuitive operation and visualisation.
You are a top programmer. C++, CUDA or Python are not foreign words to you.
You are interested in Deep Learning. You like designing software architectures.
Then help us make the world a safer place.
▪ Conception, development and maintenance of a software solution with
customer-specific characteristics
▪ Extension of the innovative, service-oriented software architecture in the
team
▪ Development in C++ under Linux and Windows
▪ Use of modern software technologies (git, Atlassian tools, CMake, C++17/20,
buildroot, MQTT ...)
▪ Further development of an own operating system based on buildroot in
compliance with modern security standards
▪ Collaboration in a motivated and open-minded development team
▪ Planning and implementation of software development using SCRUM
▪ Use of the environment for server-side builds and tests
requirements_section:
▪ A completed degree in the field of computer science/engineering or a
comparable qualification
▪ Very good knowledge of C++ / Linux/ Buildroot
▪ Several years of professional experience in the relevant environment
▪ Interest in software architecture or software security
▪ A very high degree of teamwork, organisational skills and independence as
well as enjoyment in systematically solving complex problems
▪ You have a strong mathematical and spatial understanding
▪ Very good English skills (knowledge of German is a plus)

comparable qualification
▪ Very good knowledge of C++ / Linux/ Buildroot
▪ Several years of professional experience in the relevant environment
▪ Interest in software architecture or software security
▪ A very high degree of teamwork, organisational skills and independence as
well as enjoyment in systematically solving complex problems
▪ You have a strong mathematical and spatial understanding
▪ Very good English skills (knowledge of German is a plus)

responsibilities_section:
The department develops software and systems for observation and surveillance.
Camera systems and other sensors, such as radars, are radars, for example, are
intelligently interconnected and their data processed for the user. The designed,
distributed software architectures support low-end hardware as well as high-
availability, high-end server systems and cover requirements from real-time to
redundancy and automation to intuitive operation and visualisation.
You are a top programmer. C++, CUDA or Python are not foreign words to you.
You are interested in Deep Learning. You like designing software architectures.
Then help us make the world a safer place.
▪ Conception, development and maintenance of a software solution with
customer-specific characteristics
▪ Extension of the innovative, service-oriented software architecture in the
team
▪ Development in C++ under Linux and Windows
▪ Use of modern software technologies (git, Atlassian tools, CMake, C++17/20,
buildroot, MQTT ...)
▪ Further development of an own operating system based on buildroot in
compliance with modern security standards
▪ Collaboration in a motivated and open-minded development team
▪ Planning and implementation of software development using SCRUM
▪ Use of the environment for server-side builds and tests

responsibilities_section:
Use your knowledge of technology and operational best practices to drive the design, development, and implementation of cloud infrastructure that enables highly available, scalable & reliable customer experiences
Develop the monitoring architecture and implement monitoring systems, dashboards, escalations, and alerts
Manage AWS infrastructure using AWS well-architected framework principles
Mentor less experienced members of the team
Improve the processes that software engineers use to build and deploy their software in production
Implement and support CI/CD process and tools
Engage with software development, QA, and project management teams to prepare for customization or enhancements required to support frequent cloud releases
Migrate legacy services to AWS
Develop cloud and private cloud infrastructure
requirements_section:
4+ years of experience working as a DevOps Engineer
Excellent experience with AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and IaaC tools (Terraform)
Good experience with Docker and container orchestration with Kubernetes
Experienced with modern monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and Elasticsearch
Fluent in at least one software development/scripting language, Python.
You have a curiosity about how things work and love to share that knowledge with others
Passion for solving challenging problems and iterating quickly
You are directly involved in building and testing deployment pipelines, automated provisioning infrastructure, and infrastructure support services together with your colleagues
You are hands-on and passionate about building secure, reliable, and scalable infrastructure and know-how to communicate effectively within your team
You understand and have a strong interest in systems and application design
optional_section:
Good knowledge of databases such as PostgreSQL
Experience in the design and implementation DevSecOps
Experience with security best practices for AWS WAF
AWS or Kubernetes certification

location:
plac Europejski 1, Wola, Warszawa
Warszawa, Masovian
optional_technologies:
Java
JavaSpring
Junit
Vue.js
Jira
Scrum
responsibilities_section:
Designing, implementing and maintaining text and audio data processing pipelines for use in Automatic Speech Recognition.
Designing, implementing and maintaining web services created in order to influence these data processes.
Cooperation with language experts and specialists from other R&D centers.
requirements_section:
MSc or BA in Computer Science, Informatics, Mathematics, Telecommunications, Signal Processing or related fields.
Several years of hands-on experience in software engineering and database management.
Several years of experience with Python and Linux.
Experience in building data ingestion pipelines from multiple sources.
Experience in building data processing pipelines comprising multiple formats of data.
Experience with continuous delivery tools like Jenkins.
Experience with code versioning tools, such as Git.
Understanding of data modelling, architecture, workflow management (orchestration) solutions.
Ability to write test-driven reusable code that is easy to maintain and well documented.
Ability to work effectively in a multi-disciplinary and multi-cultural team.
Knowledge of English at a level that enables reading and writing technical documentation.
optional_section:
Java (Spring, Junit).
Front-end (Vue.js).
Digital Signal Processing(sox, knowledge of theory).
Jira.
Scrum.

Warszawa, Masovian
responsibilities_section:
Analysis of business requirements
Design of system architecture
Software implementation & maintenance (bug fixing)
requirements_section:
5+ years of experience in software development

Practical knowledge of Python
Sense of humor

position_name: Starszy Specjalista ds. Modelowania Ryzyka Kredytowego
location:
Stanisława Żaryna 2A, Mokotów, Warszawa
Warszawa, mazowieckie
responsibilities_section:
Rekomendowanie zmian wpływających na poprawę działania modeli
Budowa, aktualizacja, kalibracja i parametryzacja modeli statystycznych służących do kalkulacji oczekiwanych strat kredytowych (zgodnie z IFRS 9)
Sporządzanie analiz i raportów, mających na celu wyjaśnienie przyczyn zmian poszczególnych parametrów
Przeprowadzanie analiz przekrojowych i raportów dotyczących jakości portfela kredytowego Banku
Ocena działania modeli
Tworzenie dokumentacji modeli
Przygotowywanie prezentacji na potrzeby zarządcze
requirements_section:
Wykształcenie wyższe, preferowane kierunki: matematyka, statystyka, metody ilościowe w ekonomii, fizyka
Minimum 4-letnie doświadczenie w budowaniu modeli statystycznych lub walidacji modeli (preferowane modele IFRS 9)
Bardzo dobra znajomość statystyki
Bardzo dobra znajomość Excel, SQL
Bardzo dobra znajomość języka angielskiego
Wysokie zdolności analityczne i umiejętność wyciągania wniosków z przeprowadzonych analiz
Kreatywne i aktywne poszukiwanie rozwiązań
Umiejętność pracy indywidualnej i współpracy w zespole
optional_section: Dodatkowym atutem będzie znajomość Pakietu R, Python

location:
Legnicka 48, Fabryczna, Wrocław
Wrocław, Lower Silesia
responsibilities_section:
Porting of reference implementations in C to customer embedded platforms
Code optimizations and benchmarking for embedded platforms
Performance evaluation and measurements of optimized code for various target platforms and OS
Signal processing algorithms analysis in terms of complexity reduction
Validate and maintain correct behavior of SW-components via automated tests
Cooperation with team members, industry leaders and stakeholders from various continents
requirements_section:
A degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or relevant commercial experience
Proficiency in low-level C programming
Professional experience in optimization using vectorization and/or assembly programming
Basic understanding of signal processing algorithms (filters, transforms) and audio fundamentals
Professional experience in SW development under Linux (gcc or/and clang, binutils, make, cross-compilers)
Experience with task automation using Python (or another scripting language)
Open minded team player with good communication skills
Good command of English, both written and verbal
optional_section:
Analytical mind with mathematical twist
Audio or DIY electronics/robotics related hobby
Knowledge of ARM processor architectures
Knowledge of embedded Linux
Familiarity with DSP processors
Ability to program in assembly

Design, develop, and maintain Full-Stack applications using Python

Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges

Collaborate with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution

2+ years of commercial experience with Python development
Expert knowledge of a Python web framework (Django or Flask)
Knowledge of JavaScript Front-End technologies, with a focus on Vue.js or React
Experience in Windows/Linux systems
Solid knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL databases

Desirable experience with emulation systems

position_name: Senior BI Developer - Zespół Data Intelligence Solutions
location:
Aleja Zwycięstwa 13A, Aniołki, Gdańsk
Gdańsk, pomorskie
required_technologies:
Microsoft Power BI
DAX
DAX Studio
Tabular Editor
ALM Toolkit
SQL
responsibilities_section:
Projektowanie, modyfikacja i utrzymanie raportów, kokpitów zarządczych oraz aplikacji biznesowych przy wykorzystaniu narzędzi BI (prace rozwojowe – ok. 90% czasu),
Wsparcie klienta w zakresie analizy wymagań, identyfikacji źródeł danych oraz tworzenia procesów ETL,
Budowa chmurowych rozwiązań procesujących dane,
Analiza zebranych danych oraz zarządzanie nimi w hurtowniach oraz relacyjnych bazach danych,
Doradztwo w obszarze wyboru optymalnych rozwiązań, dostosowanych do potrzeb klienta,
Wsparcie w rozwoju umiejętności technicznych innych członków zespołu,
Zarządzanie małym zespołem deweloperów, odpowiedzialność za dostarczenie projektów do klienta końcowego,
Ścisła współpraca z właścicielem biznesowym, kierownikiem projektu, ekspertami obszarów biznesowych w celu efektywnej realizacji projektów,
Opracowywanie i utrzymywanie dokumentacji projektowej.
requirements_section:
Bardzo dobra znajomość Power BI oraz języka DAX,
Praktyczna umiejętność wykorzystania narzędzi: DAX Studio, Tabular Editor, ALM Toolkit,
Bardzo dobra znajomości SQL,
4 lata doświadczenia zawodowego, w tym 2 lat pracy na podobnym stanowisku,
Doświadczenie w projektowaniu raportów oraz kokpitów zarządczych, zarówno w warstwie technicznej, jak i wizualnej,
Doświadczenie we współpracy z klientem w zakresie identyfikacji i analizy wymagań,
Wykształcenie wyższe – preferowane: informatyka, metody ilościowe lub pokrewne,
Bardzo dobra znajomość języka angielskiego w mowie i piśmie,
Doświadczenie w sporządzaniu podsumowań wyników testów, analiz i dokumentacji
w językach polskim i angielskim,
Bardzo dobra organizacja pracy,
Umiejętność operowania na liczbach i wyciągania logicznych wniosków.
optional_section:
Znajomość pozostałych komponentów Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate),
Doświadczenie we wdrażaniu rozwiązań analitycznych na platformie Azure (Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, Data Lake, Data Factory, Azure Stream Analytics),
Znajomość Agile/SCRUM/DevOps,
Znajomość systemów wersjonowania Git,
Znajomość VBA, języka Python i/lub GNU R,
Znajomość JavaScript/TypeScript i/lub biblioteki d3.js.

position_name: Model Validation Quantitative Analyst, Assistant Vice President
location:
Podgórska 36, Grzegórzki, Kraków
Kraków, Lesser Poland
responsibilities_section:
Conducting model validation activities and ensure model risks are correctly identified, assessed, and captured,
Assessing model theory and model assumptions as well as considering model methods and potential options,
Testing and confirming model results by using documented procedures for running the model(s),
Reviewing code documentation for proper model implementation, including the possible simulation of results,
Working with data validation members and information technology professionals to determine model data integrity,
Performing model validation processes and performing independent model validation of significant models,
Assessing the stability and robustness of models by conducting backtesting, sensitivity testing, and stress testing,
Making recommendations and suggesting improvements related to the applicability of the different models assessed in meeting their objectives,
Ensuring compliance with the regulatory (SR11-7) and State Street quality requirements for model risk,
Delivering validation findings via management presentations and regular reports
Communicating with onsite validators, model developers and business to relay the issues and feedback and capture the action plans,
Ensuring quality checks and controls including standardization of assessments and dissemination of feedback across team members.
requirements_section:
Strong programming skills in at least one programming language (R, Python, MATLAB, C++, SAS etc.),

position_name: DevOps Engineer ze znajomością Windows Server
required_technologies:
Windows Server
PowerShell
Git
Jenkins
Azure DevOps
Hyper-V
VMware
responsibilities_section:
Design, develop, and maintain automated scripts and configurations using tools like PowerShell and PowerShell DSC to provision and manage Windows infrastructure. This includes server provisioning, configuration management, and scaling.
Automate the deployment and configuration of software applications on Windows servers using tools like PowerShell, configuration management tools, and CI/CD pipelines. Ensure smooth and efficient software releases, updates, and rollbacks.
Implement security best practices and ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations in the Windows infrastructure. Perform vulnerability assessments, apply security patches, and implement security controls to protect the infrastructure and data.
Investigate and resolve technical issues related to Windows infrastructure, software deployments, and system configurations. Provide prompt incident response and perform root cause analysis to prevent recurring problems.
requirements_section:
Strong knowledge of Windows Server operating systems.
Expertise in PowerShell and PowerShell DSC.
Proficiency in code management and CI/CD tools: Strong knowledge of code versioning systems (e.g., Git) and experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) tools such as Jenkins, Azure DevOps Pipelines, or similar platforms is important.
Knowledge of virtualization technologies like Hyper-V and VMware is essential for managing virtualized Windows environments.
Windows package management: Proficiency in using Windows package managers like Chocolatey or NuGet for managing software packages on Windows systems.
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills: The candidate should possess excellent problem-solving abilities and be able to troubleshoot issues related to Windows infrastructure, software deployments, and system configurations.
Knowledge of DevOps practices and Agile methodologies: Understanding DevOps principles and practices, as well as experience working in Agile development environments, will enable the candidate to effectively collaborate with development teams and drive efficient software delivery processes.
optional_section: Basic knowledge of Python/Bash will be an advantage.

responsibilities_section:
Designing, writing and delivering software to improve the availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of new services delivered by the Customer
Solving problems related to a new set of services delivered by the Customer. Building automation to prevent problem recurrence
Monitoring and troubleshooting infrastructure, platform and application related issues
Participating to the architectures and designs of large-scale platforms
requirements_section:
Main required skills: Python OOP, AWS Services, Terraform, REST APIs, Linux, Jenkins, Ansible
at least 4 years of commercial experience with Python
Applied experience in at least one major Python project with an application/service like structure (not just standalone scripts)
OOP knowledge applied in Python
solid experience with REST API interaction
proven experience in IT Automation: experience with configuration management system such as Ansible, Terraform or Chef.
understanding of automation tool market trends and vendor positioning. Hands-on scripting and programming skills for cloud automation.
Good knowledge about concepts as well as hands-on experience with operational monitoring of Linux-based operating systems and services but also in operational and business monitoring of applications;
Proven experience Application Development: automated CI/CD, including version control (Git), automated testing, code reviews, etc. Coding skills in Java, JavaScript, Python, Go or Ruby;
Application Performance Monitoring: experience and knowledge of metrics-based monitoring systems (Dynatrace, NewRelic or AppDynamics) and frameworks such as Graphite, InfluxDB, Prometheus, Grafana or similar
Cloud System Architecture: conceptual knowledge and hands-on experience of systems management and monitoring functions. Understanding of cloud architecture concepts and styles (SaaS, PaaS and IaaS), containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes) and related concepts. Experiences with Cloud Foundry, OpenShift or Kubernetes are desired
optional_section: Nice to have: Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Github, Cloud Architecture, Cloud based DB solutions, Github Actions, GitOps

location:
Wierzbięcice 1b, Wilda, Poznań
Poznań, Greater Poland
required_technologies:
SQL
A/B tests
Tableau
Data Studio
responsibilities_section:
You will conduct analyzes for the Delivery Experience area from the buyer's side in the scope of:
customer behavior on the purchasing path related to the choice of delivery method
prediction of delivery times
returns process
post-purchase experience;
… from the seller's side:
working with delivery price lists
using different delivery methods
using Ship with Allegro tool;
as well as for other logistics services:
warehouse services
Allegro's own delivery network - including our green parcel machines
own broadcasting platform - including the study of the profitability of offered services
implementation of the Allegro platform on new markets.
You will analyze large data sets in search of patterns and dependencies that affect key areas for the company
You will influence the shape of products by making design recommendations based on data analysis
Your task will also be to verify new hypotheses by designing and conducting A/B tests
You will have an impact on the designed and implemented solutions through constant cooperation with development teams
Thanks to the results of your analysis, people in the organization will receive tips on how to make the experience of Allegro users unique
requirements_section:
know SQL at a very good level (knowledge of Python will be an advantage)
have experience in processing and analyzing large data sets
have min. 3 years of experience in independent work with analytical projects
know how to choose statistical methods and data visualization techniques adequate to the problem (Tableau/Data Studio is welcome)
have statistical knowledge to conduct A/B tests
care about the reusability of the code
have the ability to independently formulate hypotheses, design and conduct analyses
are able to cooperate with many stakeholders, while developing effective and clear ways of communication
know English at a minimum level of B2

responsibilities_section:
Core values
We believe that every problem has a solution, often hidden and not so obvious. Our job is to work out them and the best are born from imagination, cooperation and being craftsmanship.
How do we work?
We work with clients for their benefit and the benefit of their target users. We often act as consultants and architects, people who tear down the existing order, introducing changes and innovations. But just as often we act as craftsmen who must deliver software of the highest quality.
How the daily work will look like?
You will be assigned to a team working on a project for one of our foreign clients.  will include developing, inventing and implementing solutions to process large or distributed data.
What is expected of you?
As a Data Engineer, on a daily basis you will work with systems that process data often on a large scale
requirements_section:
best practices for designing scalable data processing systems, including data pipelines, advanced ETL processes, data warehouses, and data lakes
SQL and at least one relational database management system like MySQL or PostgreSQL
at least one NoSQL database like HBase, DynamoDB, or MongoDB
working principles of distributed data processing systems (Apache Spark, Apache Flink, or similar)
experience in Python 3.x
experience in using orchestration tools like Apache Airflow or Dagster
good communication skills in English (minimum B2)
optional_section:
at least one cloud platform (AWS, Azure, GCP) and its solutions related to data processing
understanding and knowing messages broker systems like Apache Kafka or AWS Kinesis
knowledge of search systems like ElasticSearch or Solr
experience in using CI/CD tools like Github Actions
experience in implementing solutions using frameworks like Hadoop, Hive or Presto
experience in machine learning or statistics
other development skills like REST API or GraphQL
data scraping experience

position_name: Senior DevOps Engineer for Cloud Services
location:
plac Europejski 1, Wola, Warszawa
Warszawa, Masovian
responsibilities_section:
Co-architect new services, including failure tolerance and self-healing by-design, as well as establishing clear scaling-out paths
Translate Product Owner requirements into actionable technical tasks
Participate in shared on-call rotation
Evaluating and benchmarking new solutions, establishing capacity and growth plans
Developing and supporting usable and maintainable tooling for the engineering organization
Evangelize the use of the Engineering Platform (Kubernetes, etc.) offering to the broader engineering community
Administration of services, whether built in-house or from external vendors
Continuous optimization of services on all layers (hardware, software) for high performance
Monitoring of all critical services, sharing pager duty, troubleshooting, and addressing problems as they arise (including any needed changes in code, topology, resources, or configuration)
Backup/DR implementation, plans, documentation, and exercises
Co-own technical relationships with several service providers and vendors
requirements_section:
Strong expertise administrating and scaling Kubernetes on bare metal and AWS (CKA, CKAD, CKS are nice to have)
Relevant software engineering experience with at least one language (Go, Ruby, Python)
Strong understanding of distributed systems and client-server architectures
Have a solid foundation in systems programming, computer science, and software engineering
Strong Linux system administration and troubleshooting skills, including solid knowledge of how the various components work (kernel, CPU, memory, disk, network)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools (Terraform and custom modules)
Experience working in microservices environments
Capacity and willingness to work in an agile multi-team environment
Be resourceful, inventive, and passionate about technologies
You are eager to challenge the status quo and willing to learn new programming languages
Demonstrated ability to prioritize tasks and promptly resolve problems
Ability to work autonomously, multi-task, and work in a fast-paced environment
Be proactive, addressing potential issues before they occur
Strong attention to detail
You have a track record of making things better and leading solutions that remove technical pain points and facilitate growth
You enjoy working with others who are intelligent and passionate about building practical, reliable, high-performance products
Excellent communication skills in English

responsibilities_section:
Taking care of the test automation framework and tooling for your team
Driving manual testing debt reduction process in the team
Overseeing the execution of test batches for the components in scope
Supporting UAT/Regression phase execution for release validation
Identifying, documenting and tracking issues
Working on the continuous integration of the test scripts and driving your Squad towards continuous testing
Working closely with Software/Test Engineers and Product Managers across the project to understand the context and drive automation and testing to meet objectives
Promoting testing best practices (e.g. shift-left approach) within the organization and provide guidance and assistance to enable developers to test
Cooperating with fellow Automation Test Engineers to improve the tooling and frameworks.
requirements_section:
Experience (3 to 5+ years) as a QA Automation Engineer or SDET role
Hands-on experience with Cypress tool
Experience with SaaS in a B2B heavily regulated environment (telco, banking, pharma) using Kubernetes, Docker
Experience with building/maintaining CI/CD pipelines with the tools like GitLab, Jenkins
Experience in programming with scripting languages like Python (preferably), Ansible or Bash
Experience with Test Management Tools like Zephyr, Xray or similar
Experience with working in an Agile/Scrum development process
Excellent knowledge of English, both spoken and written

Minimum 2-letnie doświadczenie zawodowe w obszarze rozwoju produktów integrujących elementy elektroniki, mechaniki i systemów automatyki
Umiejętność tworzenia rozwiązań z wykorzystaniem języków programowania (C++, Python, Matlab lub podobne)
Projektowanie obwodów PCB w środowisku Eagle (dobór rozwiązań wg wytycznych, dobór komponentów, schemat, PCB, dokumentacja produkcyjna)
Umiejętność obsługi sprzętu laboratoryjnego, np. zasilacz stabilizowany, multimetr, oscyloskop
Umiejętność lutowania elementów SMD i THT
Umiejętności analityczne i syntetycznej prezentacji wyników prac
Zdolność krytycznego myślenia i kreatywnego rozwiązywania problemów
Bardzo dobra znajomość języka angielskiego (minimum B2)
Umiejętność pracy w zespole
optional_section:
Obsługa narzędzi CAD
Podstawowa znajomość Altiuma
Znajomość podstaw metrologii
Znajomość zagadnień z zakresu mikrosystemów i nanotechnologii

location:
Aleje Jerozolimskie 125, Ochota, Warszawa
Warszawa, mazowieckie
required_technologies:
Server Node Architecture
Lenovo
HPE
Dell Server Management Tools
responsibilities_section:
Budowa i rozwój innowacyjnego środowiska w Bonn w ścisłej współpracy z lokalnymi i globalnymi
działami technologicznymi i strategicznymi
Koordynacja i tworzenie nowych procesów akceptacji nowych komponentów i systemów obliczeniowych
Sporządzanie protokołów testowych
Koordynacja wymagań z działami i dostawcami zewnętrznymi
Zarządzanie relacjami z dostawcami i zapewnienie optymalnej integracji istniejących i nowych zasobów z infrastrukturą
Projektowanie i programowanie na potrzeby wdrażania aplikacji i optymalizacja cyklu życia - w tym monitorowanie, kontrola wydajności, tworzenie mechanizmów bezpieczeństwa i strategii aktualizacji
requirements_section:
Min. 3 lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku
Doświadczenie z Server Node Architecture
Wiedza z obszaru IP Network, Server & Storage
Umiejętność skryptowania i tworzenia przypadków testowych
Doświadczenie z Lenovo, HPE, Dell Server Management Tools
Znajomość narzędzi pomiaru wyników i wydajności
Umiejętności automatyzacji przypadków testowych / automatyzacji testów
Doświadczenie w ocenie i wyborze frameworków do automatyzacji testów oraz w tworzeniu raportów
Doświadczenie z IaaS
Doświadczenie z Hashicorp Vault i Terraform Enterprise (Terraform Cloud) lub znajomość Infoblox
Język angielski na poziomie min. B2/C1
Język niemiecki na poziomie min. A2
optional_section: Umiejętności DevOps: CI/CD, Git, Python, Ansible i Terraform, doświadczenie w specyfikacji Open API / REST API

location:
Łużycka 8c, Mały Kack, Gdynia
Gdynia, Pomeranian
responsibilities_section:
Design and develop Mosaic CP product.
Design and develop CI pipeline infrastructure needed to carry out build and test requirements for Mosaic CP.
Perform or assist in high-level and low-level software design and implementation of new modules and enhancements to existing software.
Perform or assist in feasibility studies of needed software development.
Document the design including features definition and architecture.
Help to model and define APIs using YANG or similar standards.
Conduct and participate in design reviews and code reviews.
Plan and perform unit and system level testing of implemented software modules and enhancements.
Help fix software bugs found during all testing phases.
Work with team to deploy and test incremental software releases.
Organize and coordinate development activities within schedule and product constraints.
Other projects and assignments may result and be assigned to accommodate the changing needs of the department and the Company.
Guide and develop less experienced engineers.
requirements_section:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Computer Information Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent education required.
At least 9 years of active experience.
Experience with software design, implementation and debugging including inter-process communication and multi-threading techniques is required.
A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering.
Experience with Python3, Bash and Linux-based scripting environment.
Experience with testing and development tools such as pyTest and Postman.
Experience with Test Driven Development and Unit Test Frameworks.
Experience developing and deploying large scale applications.
Excellent teamwork abilities.
At least B1 English proficiency level.
optional_section:
Familiarity with Ethernet and networking protocols is a plus.
Experience with building SDK Platform-Tools
Experience with Docker orchestration and management.

responsibilities_section:
Będziesz operował/a dużymi zbiorami danych, przygotowując analizy, prognozy i rekomendacje związane z działalnością Biura Reklamy
Będziesz rozwijał/a narzędzia analityczne wspierające odbiorców biznesowych w zakresie generowania nowych insightów z danych i ułatwiania procesów decyzyjnych
Będziesz analizował/a zachowania reklamodawców w różnych punktach ścieżki styku z platformą, a wnioski z Twoich analiz będą bezpośrednio miały wpływ na jej rozwój
requirements_section:
Posiadasz co najmniej 3-letnie doświadczenie w roli analityka danych (mile widziane doświadczenie w branży e-commerce / advertising / consulting)
Posiadasz doświadczenie w przetwarzaniu i analizie (SQL & Python) dużych zbiorów danych
Posiadasz praktyczne doświadczenie w wizualizacji danych (Tableau / Data Studio)
Masz podejście “glass half full” - myślisz o rozwiązaniach, a nie o problemach
Efektywnie komunikujesz się w języku angielskim (ustnie i pisemnie)
optional_section: Praktyczna znajomość machine learning (np. Scikit-learn), cloud (w szczególności GCP) oraz code management (np. Git)

location:
Pawia 9, Stare Miasto, Kraków
Kraków, Lesser Poland
responsibilities_section:
Developing interactive 3D graphics using Three.js and Vanilla JavaScript
Designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using Node.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript
Creating and utilizing shaders and shader materials for custom visual effects
Implementing post-processing effects using native Three.js capabilities or the 'postprocessing' library
Optimizing rendering performance and addressing performance bottlenecks
Collaborating with designers and developers, and effectively communicating project requirements
Testing, debugging, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility
requirements_section:
Proven experience in three.js using Vanilla JavaScript, with a portfolio showcasing your 3D web development projects
Solid background in designing, developing, and maintaining web applications using Node.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript
Proficiency in using and creating Shaders and Shader Materials to achieve desired visual effects
Familiarity with PostProcessing effects, either through native Three.js or the 'postprocessing' library, to enhance visual quality
Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for pushing the boundaries of interactive web experiences
Advanced English in speaking and writing (you will be working with international clients only)
optional_section:
Experience with PHP, Python, JavaScript services
Customer-focused mindset, striving to deliver exceptional experiences
Excellent attention to detail and the ability to prioritize effectively

position_name: Senior Data Scientist in Artificial Intelligence Team
location:
plac Europejski 1, Wola, Warszawa
Warszawa, Masovian
responsibilities_section:
Development of Machine Learning models for audience building and/or user profiling (research as well as production-grade code base)
Design, set up and maintenance of data and ML pipelines with MLOps tools, including analysis, exploration and processing of various data types
Taking ownership of technical mentoring and leading subprojects
Contribution to project planning
Continuous knowledge development, tracking and implementation of the latest trends
Contribution to creation of innovative technology by means of development of prototypes, proof of concepts, scientific publications and/or patent applications
Delivering functional and technical documentation
requirements_section:
Excellent programming skills in Python
5+ years of experience in applying Data Science/Machine Learning on large scale datasets and building or maintaining ML pipelines
Solid experience in deploying Python code for ML pipelines in production environment, especially cloud based (AWS preferred)
Deep understanding of ML algorithms (both from a theoretical and practical perspective) with expert level knowledge of ML libraries (scikit-learn, pandas, TensorFlow, PyTorch, pyspark, etc.) or experience in ML pipelines deployment solutions proven by knowledge of related tools: AWS (e.g. Airflow, EMR, Sagemaker), PySpark
Working experience in SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g. Snowflake)
Good knowledge of CI/CD principles (e.g.: GitHub and GitHub Actions)
Master degree in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics or related fields
Command of English in speech and writing allowing free communication in cross-team international collaboration
optional_section:
PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics or related fields
Experience in any of the following domains: recommendation systems, ads targeting, user profiling, churn prediction
Familiarity with algorithms optimization (memory, processing speed, scalability, GPU)

company_name: UNITY-T GROUP sp. z o.o. sp.k.
contract_type: umowa o pracę, umowa zlecenie, kontrakt b2b
required_technologies:
GNU/Linux
TCP/IP
Postfix
Dovecot
Tomcat
httpd
HAProxy
optional_technologies:
Proxmox
XEN
LDAP
Ansible
Samba
NFS
responsibilities_section:
Prowadzenie projektu od momentu wpłynięcia inicjatywy projektowej do momentu jego zakończenia.
Wsparcie projektów realizowanych przez Dział IT.
Bieżące utrzymanie infrastruktury i reakcja na zgłoszenia.
Bliska współpraca z biznesowymi właścicielami projektów oraz zespołem IT.
Przygotowanie raportów, analiz prowadzonych projektów.
requirements_section:
Bardzo dobra znajomość systemów GNU/Linux (RHEL/CentOS).
Dobra znajomość protokołów sieciowych TCP/IP + ogólna wiedza na temat sieci komputerowych.
Dobra znajomość serwerów Postfix, Dovecot, filtracji antywirusowej i antyspamowej, kierunków rozwoju współczesnych systemów pocztowych.
Znajomość usług sieciowych Tomcat, httpd, nginx, HAProxy, Keepalived, named.
Znajomość języka skryptowego do automatyzacji zadań administracyjnych Bash / Python.
Co najmniej roczne doświadczenie na podobnym stanowisku.
optional_section:
Znajomość relacyjnych baz danych: PostgreSQL, MySQL.
Znajomość rozwiązań wirtualizacji Citrix wraz z narzędziami do ich administracji: XenServer, XenCenter, XenOrchestra.
Znajomość usług sieciowych Samba, NFS, OpenLDAP, mongodb, squid.
Znajomość narzędzi do zarządzania konfiguracją (Puppet, Ansible).

location:
Adama Branickiego 17, Wilanów, Warszawa
Warszawa, mazowieckie
required_technologies:
Microsoft Excel
Microsoft Power BI
SQL
responsibilities_section:
Nadzór nad przestrzenią Maczfit Official (Snowflake) – tworzenie koncepcji nowych widoków, utrzymywanie dokumentacji, ustalanie standardów współpracy z BI DEV
Przygotowywanie analiz (transformacja, modelowanie i wizualizacja informacji pochodzących z dużych zbiorów danych) na potrzeby działów biznesowych oraz kluczowych projektów, pozwalających na monitorowanie inicjatyw i efektywne komunikowanie postępów
Projektowanie raportów i dashboardów, w oparciu o zasady efektywnej wizualizacji danych oraz specyficzne potrzeby biznesowe
Wykorzystanie języka programowania Python do tworzenia skryptów analitycznych i automatyzacji procesów
Koordynacja projektów standaryzacji oraz automatyzacji procesów analitycznych – w szczególności w zakresie optymalizacji przygotowania danych, kalkulacji wskaźników i najlepszych praktyk prezentacji informacji zarządczej
Współpraca z interesariuszami w zakresie wyznaczenia i zastosowania krótko i długo-terminowych KPI spójnych z finansowymi celami firmy i strategią
Współpraca przy tworzeniu strategii rozwoju narzędzi analitycznych/BI w organizacji
requirements_section:
Doświadczony analityk, który lubi wgłębić się w dane, ustrukturyzować problemy i przeprowadzać analizy przekładające się na biznesowe rekomendacje (doświadczenie w Programach lojalnościowych/ Retail/ eCommerce/ FMCG mile widziane)
Minimum 3 lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku
Wykształcenie wyższe (preferowane ekonomiczne, informatyczne lub pokrewne)
Biegła znajomość MS Excel (mile widziana znajomość PowerPivot, VBA, DAX, PowerQuery)
Doświadczenie w zakresie projektowania raportów i dashboardów przy użyciu nowoczesnych narzędzi BI (znajomość MS PowerBI)
Doświadczenie w zakresie transformacji dużych zbiorów danych oraz pracy z hurtowniami danych (dobra znajomość języka SQL)
Silna orientacja biznesowa i koncentracja na wyznaczonych celach
Umiejętności komunikacyjne, pozwalające na przełożenie potrzeb biznesowych na konkretne rozwiązania analityczne
Samodzielności i kreatywności w poszukaniu rozwiązań problemów biznesowych
Zaangażowanie i dobra organizacja pracy własnej; umiejętność budowy solidnych relacji z interesariuszami i członkami zespołu

required_technologies:
Java
HTML
CSS
3GPP
GSM
NAS
LTE
responsibilities_section:
Direct interface to Tier 1 and Tier 2 chipset/module suppliers in order to coordinate and execute 3GPP certification activities for the Deutsche Telekom group – 30%
Serve as mobile connectivity technology expert, with responsibilities including the technical assessment of 5G (NSA/SA) / LTE / IMS (VoLTE) and component integration to Campus Private networks – 20%
Development of IoT Hardware database platform frontend in order to facilitate customer requirements and improve its functionality by adding extra features -30%
Analyze 3GPP protocol implementation, conformance and performance on live network and laboratory environments, as well as simulators (e.g. Rohde & Schwarz CMW500, CMX500, Anite etc.) – 10%
Support customer troubleshooting activities, often in direct dialog and investigation with customer interfaces – 10%

you have experience with Cloud platforms - AWS or GCP,
you know Linux terminal/environment very well,

you are proactive communicator with practical solution-oriented mindset able to liaise with
both business-side and IT-side stakeholders.

technologiczne zacięcie (jeśli sformułowania: python, java, internet rzeczy - nie są Ci obce, jeśli odróżniasz Frontend od Backendu, i bawią Cię żarty programistyczne – aplikuj!)
znajomość nowoczesnych technik marketingowych ukierunkowanych na Public Relations oraz kanałów Social Media

znajomość języka angielskiego w stopniu komunikatywnym
inicjatywa, kreatywność i duża samodzielność

company_name: HSBC Service Delivery (Polska) Sp. z o.o.
location:
Kapelanka 42a, Dębniki, Kraków
Kraków, Lesser Poland
responsibilities_section:
Ownership of security outcomes (in relation to applicable cloud platform) as per management direction and HSBC Policy.
Identifying, developing, and implementing new preventive, detective, and corrective controls in one or more cloud platforms (Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and Alibaba Cloud).
Managing pre-production cloud security reviews, through manual and automated processes.
Evolving and maintaining an in house cloud security knowledge base (Cloud Build Security Hub).
Reviewing/ challenging/ escalating requests from Global Businesses and Functions for exemptions/ exceptions from mandatory security requirements.
Actively participating in Global Businesses and Functions Architecture/ Design/ Cloud Deployment Pattern reviews and provide feedback to ensure cloud services meet mandatory security requirements and operate in a secure way.
Actively support security vendor/ tooling selection for HSBC.
Collaboratively work with vendors, client staff and contractors to implement and integrate vendor-provided Cloud Security solutions as required.
Managing development of API integrations and recommend configuration changes to improve the performance, usability, and value of cloud security tools.
Liaising with other engineers, architects, and business stakeholders to understand and drive the product or service’s direction.
Driving continuous improvement of cloud security and automate processes to minimize variation and ensure predictable high quality code and data.
Supporting incident management processes.
Leading a small team of cloud security engineers.
Proactively researching emerging threats and vulnerabilities to aid in the identification of cloud threats.
requirements_section:
Expert level knowledge and hands on experience in any one or more Cloud platforms including Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and Alibaba Cloud.
Extensive working knowledge of software development tools and technologies; e.g Python, Bash, PowerShell, SQL, and data formats such as XML, JSON, CSV.
Experience in system/infrastructure implementation and operations.
Customer/stakeholder focus. Ability to build strong relationships with Application teams, cross functional IT and global/local IT teams.
Self-motivated and possessing of a high sense of urgency and personal integrity.
Strong problem-solving and trouble-shooting skills.
Strong knowledge of Agile working methodologies.
5+ years of experience in a cyber security role or similar.
Excellent written and spoken communication skills with an ability to;
communicate with impact, ensuring complex information is articulated in a meaningful way to wide and varied audiences
produce clear and concise reports/control documentation for targeted audiences across internal and external stakeholders.
Would be beneficial:
experience of working with Kubernetes or other container orchestration experience in building and deploying applications on the Cloud, using CI/CD frameworks and Infrastructure automation, such as: Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible, GitHub and Nexus.
Professional Security related qualifications.

required_technologies:
Python
Java
AWS
Git
Nexus
Artifactory
Gradle
Teamscale
CI/CD
responsibilities_section:
Tworzenie skryptów i automatyzacja (Python, Bash itp.) wdrożeń produktów, infrastruktury, zarządzania kontenerami i zadań
Konfiguracja i utrzymanie kontenerowych aplikacji m.in. Docker
Konfiguracja produktów i usług na AWS
Implementacja koncepcji bezpieczeństwa (szyfrowanie, uwierzytelnianie, firewalle)
Pomoc zespołom produktowym w tworzeniu i ulepszaniu ich ciągłości dostaw i miejsca pracy
Bycie częścią wielokulturowego zespołu, wprowadzanie w życie myślenia zwinnego i DevOps
requirements_section:
Minimum 3 lata doświadczenia w tworzeniu i obsłudze oprogramowania
Umiejętność pisania skryptów (np. Python lub inne języki programowania)
Bardzo dobra znajomość infrastruktury, sieci i systemów operacyjnych (Ubuntu, macOS, Linux)
Bardzo dobra znajomość koncepcji i narzędzi CI/CD (GIT, Nexus, Artifactory, Gradle, Teamscale)
Doświadczenie z koncepcjami i dostawcami chmury, wirtualizacją i kontenerami (najlepiej w AWS)
Dobra znajomość koncepcji i rozwiązań związanych z bezpieczeństwem
Doświadczenie w tworzeniu oprogramowania (Java)
Znajomość języka angielskiego na poziomie min. B2/C1

company_name: Merit Poland Sp z o. o.
location:
Podole 60, Dębniki, Kraków
Kraków, Lesser Poland
responsibilities_section:
Working in software testing of mechatronics products for automotive like Steering Wheel Modules, Steering Wheel Switches, etc.
Direct cooperation with the biggest car manufacturers in the world
Analysing customer’s software requirements, standards (LIN/CAN, diagnostics, cybersecurity, functional safety)
Developing and automation of test cases in a VTestStudio
Developing LIN and CAN simulations and GUIs in a Vector CANoe
Developing test functions in a CAPL language
Executing tests in CANoe, creating test reports and reporting bugs
Developing automatic test environment and test bench
Active participation in a test case reviews
Close operation with Systems, Software and Electrical departments
requirements_section:
MSc or BSc degree in Mechatronics, Robotics, Automation, Electronics, Electrical Engineering or similar
Work experience on similar position
Good English skills
Knowledge of software programming languages (preferably C/C++ or CAPL)
Knowledge of testing tools and methods
Basic knowledge of electronics and electronic measurements
Basic knowledge of microcontrollers
Methodical approach to problem solving
optional_section:
Basic knowledge of diagnostics and UDS protocol
Basic knowledge of LIN and CAN protocols

location:
Przy Rondzie 4, Grzegórzki, Kraków
Kraków, Lesser Poland
required_technologies:
Python
Machine Learning
Splunk
Apache Spark
Azure
ML OPS
responsibilities_section:
Participating in group discussions on system design and architecture
Working with product teams to communicate and translate needs into technical requirements
Working alongside our Data Scientists, Software Engineers and Product teams across the software lifecycle
Delivering high quality code and solutions, bringing solutions into production
Performing code reviews to optimize technical performance of data science solutions
Supporting production systems, resolving incidents, and performing root cause analysis
Continually look for how we can evolve and improve our technology, processes and practices
Sharing knowledge with the wider engineering community
Applying SDLC practices to create and release robust software
requirements_section:
4-5 years of experience working as a ML Engineer or Software Engineer or Python Engineer
Search and recommendation experience is desirable but not essential
Strong Software Engineering skills, with experience of different programming languages and a good grasp of at least one language, ideally Python
A background or strong understanding of the retail sector, logistics and/or ecommerce would be advantageous but is not required
Awareness of emerging MLOps practices and tooling would be an advantage e.g. feature stores and model lifecycle management
Customer focus with the right balance between outcome delivery and technical excellence
The ability to apply technical skills and know-how to solving real world business problems
Demonstratable experience of building scalable and resilient systems
Commercial experience contributing to the success of high impact Data Science projects within complex organisations
An analytical mind set and the ability to tackle specific business problems
Use of version control (Git) and related software lifecycle tooling
Experience with tooling for monitoring, logging and alerting e.g. Splunk or Grafana
Understanding of common data structures and algorithms
Experience working with open-source Data-Science environments
Knowledge of open source big-data technologies such as Apache Spark
Experience building solutions that run in the cloud, ideally Azure
Experience with software development methodologies including Scrum & Kanban

responsibilities_section:
Tworzenie rozwiązań w Celonis EMS (narzędzia aplikacji, raporty itp.) dla usprawnienia pracy globalnego FSC. Administracja systemem, generowanie pomysłów na usprawnienia procesów i raportów
Wsparcie globalnego Centrum Raportowania w tworzeniu analiz
Kontynuacja wdrażania Celonis w organizacji. Aktywna rola w dyskusjach dotyczących rozwiązań Celonis, wpływ na doświadczenia użytkownika. Projektowanie i opracowywanie wymagań technicznych na podstawie zatwierdzonych procesów biznesowych
requirements_section:
dobra znajomość Celonis i użycia SQL w procesach finansowych
umiejętność wizualizacji danych (np. Tableau, Power BI)
płynna znajomość angielskiego (B2+/C1)
optional_section:
2-4 lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku (reporting, analiza danych, analizy finansowe)
Python lub inne narzędzia automatyzacji

responsibilities_section:
Projektowanie, testowanie i wdrażanie układów elektronicznych.
Tworzenie oprogramowania dla układów PLD.
Tworzenie oprogramowania testowego dla systemów wbudowanych.
Wsparcie grupy programistów systemów embedded.
requirements_section:
Wiedza z zakresu teorii układów cyfrowych i budowy układów FPGA.
Znajomość przynajmniej jednego z języków HDL (Verilog, VHDL).
Doświadczenie w użytkowaniu oprogramowania EAD dla układów FPGA.
Doświadczenie w projektowaniu i testowaniu układów elektronicznych.
Doświadczenie w projektowaniu obwodów drukowanych (PCB).
Znajomość narzędzi systemów wersjonowania SVN.
Umiejętność czytania i tworzenia dokumentacji technicznej.
Umiejętność biegłego czytania anglojęzycznej dokumentacji technicznej.
Umiejętność pracy zespołowej, dokładność, komunikatywność oraz sumienność.
optional_section:
Znajomość architektury AVR, ARM oraz zagadnień EMI/EMC.
Znajomość języka programowania C.
Znajomość innych języków HDL i HLS oraz języków skryptowych Tcl, Python.
Znajomość innych technologii związanych z układami FPGA.
Znajomość systemów RTOS i Linux.
Znajomość środowiska Altium.

responsibilities_section:
Rozwój systemu operacyjnego GNU/Linux na platformę ARM.
Tworzenie i modyfikowanie modułów jądra Linux.
Aplikowanie poprawek bezpieczeństwa do istniejącego kodu.
Dbanie o aktualność systemu operacyjnego Linux.
requirements_section:
Bardzo dobra znajomość języka programowania C.
Znajomość budowy kernela oraz modułów GNU/Linux.
Znajomość systemu patchowania kodu źródłowego.
Znajomość narzędzi systemów wersjonowania: GIT i SVN.
Umiejętność biegłego czytania anglojęzycznej dokumentacji technicznej.
Umiejętność pracy zespołowej, dokładność, komunikatywność oraz sumienność.
optional_section:
Znajomość systemu budowania embedded Linux: Buildroot.
Znajomość języków skryptowych (bash, Lua, Python, Perl, …) oraz C++, C#.
Znajomość zagadnień bezpieczeństwa systemu Linux.
Znajomość standardu informacji o podatnościach CVE.
Znajomość narzędzi do zarządzania procesem kompilacji makefile i cmake.
Znajomość architektury ARM.

responsibilities_section:
Take part in internal and external projects for our customers with the scope of definition, installation, automation, optimisation and maintenance of the IT environments –the hardware as well as on system-application level (Jenkins, Tomcat, WebLogic, JBoss, WebSphere Oracle DB, PostgreSQL, JIRA)
Maintain and configure the key IT infrastructure elements of the company: VMware servers, matrixes, Linux and Windows operating systems, network devices
Implement and maintain the cloud infrastructure (AWS, MS Azure)
Implement the DevOps culture in big international projects
Implement, maintain and optimise the IT processes
Support other users and help them use the IT infrastructure of the company
requirements_section:
Be a graduate in the field of IT or similar – we also welcome students from the last grade of technical studies
Know the tools for Continuous Integration/Delivery and have experience in the development process automation, software deployment and testing (Jenkins, Bamboo, GIT, GitLab, Gerrit, JMeter, Selenium or other similar)
Know the tools for automated build environments (Ansible, Puppet, Chef, KitchenCI, Terraform or other similar)
Know the administration issues of Linux and Windows
Have experience in the usage and configuration of those systems
Know at least the basics of SQL language
Know English well
Be interested in a long-term cooperation and the development of competences in the broadly defined IT administration and infrastructure
Be able to work and travel in Poland and the European Union
optional_section:
Know tools for virtualization, mainly VMWare
Know issues related to containerization (e.g. Docker) and platforms for infrastructure scaling, related to containers (Kubernates/OpenShift)
Know script languages (e.g. Bash, PowerShell, Python)
Are able to manage and configure Apache Tomcat, WebLogic, JBoss servers
Have knowledge about database administration (Oracle DB, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Know cloud technologies (Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure)

responsibilities_section:
Take part in internal and external projects for our customers with the scope of definition, installation, automation, optimisation and maintenance of the IT environments –the hardware as well as on system-application level (Jenkins, Tomcat, WebLogic, JBoss, WebSphere Oracle DB, PostgreSQL, JIRA)
Maintain and configure the key IT infrastructure elements of the company: VMware servers, matrixes, Linux and Windows operating systems, network devices
Implement and maintain the cloud infrastructure (AWS, MS Azure)
Implement the DevOps culture in big international projects
Implement, maintain and optimise the IT processes
Support other users and help them use the IT infrastructure of the company
requirements_section:
Be a graduate in the field of IT or similar – we also welcome students from the last grade of technical studies
Know the tools for Continuous Integration/Delivery and have experience in the development process automation, software deployment and testing (Jenkins, Bamboo, GIT, GitLab, Gerrit, JMeter, Selenium or other similar)
Know the tools for automated build environments (Ansible, Puppet, Chef, KitchenCI, Terraform or other similar)
Know the administration issues of Linux and Windows
Have experience in the usage and configuration of those systems
Know at least the basics of SQL language
Know English well
Be interested in a long-term cooperation and the development of competences in the broadly defined IT administration and infrastructure
Be able to work and travel in Poland and the European Union
optional_section:
Know tools for virtualization, mainly VMWare
Know issues related to containerization (e.g. Docker) and platforms for infrastructure scaling, related to containers (Kubernates/OpenShift)
Know script languages (e.g. Bash, PowerShell, Python)
Are able to manage and configure Apache Tomcat, WebLogic, JBoss servers
Have knowledge about database administration (Oracle DB, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Know cloud technologies (Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure)

responsibilities_section:
zarządzanie portfelami w zakresie zakupu i sprzedaży energii elektrycznej oraz gazu, uprawnień do emisji CO2 i świadectw pochodzenia, na rynkach terminowych oraz spot,
analizowanie sytuacji rynkowej (KSE, uprawnienia do emisji CO2, rynek paliw),
budowanie i rozwój strategii zakupowych dla portfeli,
sprzedaż produktów portfelowych, nadzorowanie realizacji umów, przygotowywanie analiz i raportów marży zmiennej,
budowanie i rozwój narzędzi analitycznych do zarządzania marżą zmienną,
rekomendowanie kontraktów na zakup paliw, negocjowanie i nadzorowanie realizacji umów z tego obszaru, tworzenie planów dostaw paliw.
requirements_section:
wykształcenie wyższe (techniczne, ekonomiczne),
co najmniej roczne doświadczenie zawodowe na podobnym stanowisku,
znajomość rynku energii, w szczególności rynku energii elektrycznej, gazu i uprawnień do emisji CO2,
komunikatywna znajomość języka angielskiego,
umiejętność analizy rynku, interpretacji danych rynkowych,
umiejętność podejmowania decyzji i rozwiązywania problemów,
zorganizowanie, komunikatywność i współpraca w zespole,
dobra znajomość aplikacji i narzędzi informatycznych (BI, MS Excel).
optional_section: znajomość SQL, VBA, Python.

location:
aleja Jana Pawła II 22, Śródmieście, Warszawa
Warszawa, Masovian
responsibilities_section:
Lead a team of data analysts to simulate the rule based systems and providing relevant events to be investigated by alert investigations team
Prototype and validate additional controls to complement existing controls
Analyse data to help improve thresholds and other control parameters that prevent false negatives to occur and to minimize false positives
Advise on how to improve TM processes and outcomes by using statistically sound methods
Ensuring that data projects align with organizational goals
Assess data quality (contextual sanity checks) and identify quality and integrity issues that affect alert generation and investigation
Adhere to stringent quality assurance and documentation standards using version control and code repositories (e.g., Git, GitHub, Markdown)
Responsible for the conception, planning, and prioritizing of data projects
Utilizing data visualization tools to deliver insights to stakeholders
requirements_section:
You have 10+ years combined in business intelligence, and data science projects and departments preferably in global financial services industry preferably in the area of TM/ AML
You have the ability to identify problems, analysing key information and making connections, in order to find appropriate solutions and make data driven decisions.
You have experience in leading data analytics teams with the ability to gain support for ideas and solutions relying on persuasion rather than authority in order to achieve organisational goals and objectives
You are able to have in dept discussions with data analysts and data scientists and also able to explain understandably to broader business audience
You have experience in Python programming, SQL and big data framework
You have experience with statistical inference (e.g. predictive analytics, clustering, Machine Learning Algorithms
You are able to clearly and succinctly express ideas, opinions and present results of analysis to non-technical audience.
You are able to support internal and external customers to meet and understand their needs and expectations
You have good leadership, team management and decision making skills
You show openness to change and altering behaviours in order to work effectively when faced with various stakeholders, new information, a changing situation and/or environment.
Fluent in English speaking and in writing.

responsibilities_section:
What you’ll do:
•Produce robust and stable network designs, primarily in a data centre domain (both on-prem and cloud), in accordance with ISS global network and security standards
•Deploy network solutions into our production network which involves working with in country heads to agree on a change window slot, raising a change, carrying out the implementation, liaising with business to ensure post change testing is done and updating documentation
•Operate the data centre network (responds to tickets, assist in troubleshooting)
Who you’ll work with:
In your role as network service operation engineer, you will be in close collaboration with:
•Global Security Architecture and Global Information Security
•Global IT Architecture
•Global compute and storage services
•In country IT infrastructure heads
requirements_section:
Key qualifications (ideal candidate would have all or a combination of these):
•Hands-on experience with configuration and operation of Palo Alto next generation firewalls
•In-depth knowledge of networking designs and solutions including routing (OSPF/BGP), data centre (load balancers, firewalls, resiliency concepts), WAN (e.g. SD-WAN)
•Experience (or an appetite to get experienced) with public cloud networking designs and operations (ideally Azure, but also AWS)
•Experience (or an appetite to get experienced) with Cisco Meraki solution
•Knowledge and/or experience with various network solutions (e.g Cisco ISE)
•Knowledge and/or experience with network automation tools (git, Ansible, Python) is considered a plus
•Network certification is considered a benefit
Personal skills you excel:
•Fluency in English
•Desire to work in an international team

This role will be a key position in supporting and expanding backend systems for our solution. A strong understanding of backend systems that support distributed processing and application resiliency is very important to the success of this position as well.
Maintenance and development of new features for a cloud-based Python application.
Designing and implementing efficient and scalable programming solutions.
Close cooperation with an international team of developers.
Ensuring reliable robot connectivity to the Internet (connection bounding, data compression).
Analysis of current problems and implementation fixes.
requirements_section:

Ability to work both independently and in a team.

responsibilities_section:
Become a member of a domain team of developers and help us shape the future of our data engineering and build an event sourcing architecture.
Design and develop data structures, pipelines and ETL processes to help move and transform terabytes of data between the applications.
Execute Data Governance practices, keeping our data secure, transparent and in good quality.

Understanding of Agile project methodologies, such as Scrum.

position_name: Inżynier ds. Standardów, Rozwoju i Utrzymania Sieci Transmisyjnej
responsibilities_section:
Koordynacja i techniczna weryfikacja projektów wdrażania elementów/usług sieciowych,
Wsparcie w procesach tworzenia wymagań technicznych, standardów, procedur i odbiorów usług transmisji,
Analiza i monitorowanie jakości sieci w systemach transmisyjnych lub na podstawie dostępnych statystyk zgodnie z rekomendacjami i standardami telekomunikacyjnymi (ITU-T, MEF itp.),
Współpraca z dostawcami sprzętu i usług, definiowanie wymagań i analiza rozwiązań dla usług transmisji,
Udział w testach nowych rozwiązań,
Definiowanie wymagań oraz współpraca w rozwoju aplikacji wspomagających.
requirements_section:
Wykształcenie wyższe, kierunek telekomunikacja, elektronika, informatyka lub pokrewne,
Minimum 3-letnie doświadczenie na podobnym stanowisku u operatora sieci lub dostawcy sprzętu telekomunikacyjnego,
Znajomość zagadnień związanych z monitorowaniem i sposobami pomiarów jakości sieci transmisji danych,
Doświadczenie w obszarze technologii radiowych w tym sprzętu radioliniowego wiodących dostawców na rynku,
Bardzo dobra znajomość pakietowych sieci transmisji danych MPLS/Carrier Ethernet,
Ogólna znajomość architektury systemów telekomunikacyjnych 2G/3G/4G/5G,
Praktyczna znajomość pakietu MS Office (w tym szczególnie Excel),
Komunikatywna znajomość języka angielskiego,
Samodzielność i bardzo dobra organizacja pracy, proaktywność w rozwiązywaniu problemów,
Prawo jazdy kat. B.
optional_section:
Praktyczne doświadczenie związane z QGIS,
Umiejętność przygotowywania skryptów w SQL i w języku Python/Java,
Znajomość narzędzi planistycznych np. Pathloss lub podobne.

location:
Łukasza Drewny 80, Wilanów, Warszawa
Warszawa, mazowieckie
responsibilities_section:
tworzenie wysokiej jakości oprogramowania dla systemów wbudowanych (embedded) pracujących pod kontrolą systemu Linux
projektowanie architektury oprogramowania dla urządzeń telekomunikacyjnych
opracowanie i implementacja algorytmów rozwiązujących konkretne problemy z zakresu telekomunikacji
opracowanie scenariuszy testowych i tworzenie testów jednostkowych oraz funkcjonalnych
udział w badaniach i sprawdzeniach oprogramowania w warunkach rzeczywistych
tworzenie dokumentacji technicznej
requirements_section:
wykształcenie wyższe (informatyka, telekomunikacja i kierunki pokrewne)
minimum 2 lata doświadczenia na stanowisku związanym z tworzeniem oprogramowania komercyjnego w języku C
bardzo dobra znajomość języka C
zdolność analitycznego myślenia oraz chęć dalszego rozwoju
obywatelstwo polskie
optional_section:
znajomość języka C++
znajomość narzędzi GNU Toolchain (gcc, make, gdb)
znajomość systemów kontroli wersji (git)
wiedza techniczna z zakresu budowy systemów operacyjnych opartych na systemie Linux oraz tworzenia oprogramowania dla takich systemów (POSIX)
znajomość języka Python w stopniu podstawowym
znajomość technologii sieciowych TCP/IP
umiejętność tworzenia skryptów powłoki systemu Linux (Bash/Zsh)

responsibilities_section:
Design, development and execution of test automation
Design and creation of test cases
Ensuring Definition of Done is met for product backlog elements, including manual tests execution
Analysis of test results and provision of test strategy improvements
Close cooperation with developers and business stakeholders in product design
Active engagement in growth of QA best practices and tools
Provide clear and concise defect reports
Driving Quality-first mindset within the team and contributing to quality culture within the organization
requirements_section:
At least 5 years of experience in test automation field
Experience with API testing
Knowledge of Java
RestAssured/JUnit/Mockito
Familiarity with: REST architecture, Test Automation and development patterns, Programming good practices
Experience with working in AGILE methodology
optional_section:
Behaviour-Driven Development frameworks familiarity (e.g. Cucumber), Python
Self-organization and adaptability skill sets
Inquisitive mind
High communication skills

Projektowanie testów: Tworzenie przypadków testowych na podstawie wymagań, specyfikacji i analizy funkcjonalnej produktu.
Wykonywanie testów: Przeprowadzanie m.in. testów integracyjnych, testów funkcjonalnych oraz testów wydajności.
Raportowanie błędów.
Weryfikacja naprawy błędów: Potwierdzanie, czy zgłoszone błędy zostały naprawione i przeprowadzanie testów weryfikacyjnych.
Dokumentowanie wyników testów, raportowanie postępów i zapewnienie przejrzystości w procesie testowania.
Zapewnienie, że wszystkie akceptowane zmiany i nowe funkcje spełniają wysokie standardy jakości.
Udoskonalanie procesów testowania, zarządzania błędami i wdrażania oprogramowania.
Testowanie aktualizacji i migracji: Weryfikacja, czy aktualizacje i migracje nie powodują problemów w istniejących funkcjonalnościach.
requirements_section:
Doświadczenie w realizacji testów integracyjnych / E2E / UAT
Znajomość narzędzi: Postman, Selenium, Jmeter
Podstawowa umiejętność programowania: Python, Bash, JavaScript
Umiejętność tworzenia i analizowania przypadków testowych
Podstawowa znajomość technologii streamingowej w zakresie zagadnień związanych z jakością transmisji
Podstawowa znajomość systemu Linux
Doświadczenie pracy przy testach środowiska opartego o architekturę mikroserwisową
Staranność, dbałość o szczegóły, analityczne podejście
optional_section:
Wiedza dotycząca architektury platform OTT
Certyfikat ISTQB
Bardzo dobra znajomość języka angielskiego (B2/C1)

responsibilities_section:
Developing, and maintaining Spring Boot microservices for ODS application
Implementing dynamic PDF generation using Java, and Spring Boot

Deploying, and managing ODS microservices on GKE, and AWS

requirements_section:
Experience with: Java 8.0/J2EE, and related technologies (Spring Framework, and Hibernate JPA), Python, and Groovy, Microservices, and Java Design Patterns, Developing reusable APIs, and consuming web services (REST), Processing data in XML/JSON format, JavaScript build tools, and dependency management, CI/CD deployment pipeline (Jenkins, Docker, Git), Building Microservices, Solace, and Messaging
Knowledge of: RESTful API design, Elastic Search, Logstash, and Kibana (ELK), Document Driven Databases, and RDBMS (MongoDB, Oracle, Postgre), Agile/Scrum/Kanban development
Architecture experience working on all layers/tiers of a project from Front-End development through Back-End database design
Good knowledge of design patterns, and the ability to apply them to project development
Solid understanding of the full development life cycle
Track record as a results oriented person with a delivery focus
Ability to understand, and articulate both technical, and business issues with peers, management, and external teams
A disciplined approach to development, testing, and quality assurance
Fluent English
optional_section:

Proven ability to work across multiple functional teams in the creation of an application development process.

Working knowledge on MS Visio

Umiejętność projektowania i budowania mikroserwisów

position_name: Inżynier Danych (Data Engineer)- Zespół Big Data
optional_technologies:
Databricks
Airflow
PostgreSQL
Microsoft SQL Server
Azure
responsibilities_section:
budowa procesów przetwarzania danych w oparciu o usługi chmurowe Azure (m.in. Databricks) oraz on-prem (Python/SQL),
optymalizacja procesów przetwarzania danych i optymalizacja kodów Python, SQL, Pyspark,
utrzymywanie dokumentacji procesów zasileń,
implementacja procesów zarządzania jakością danych, w tym wdrożenie reguł walidacji danych, standardów wprowadzania danych,
wdrożenie automatycznych procesów monitorowania jakości danych.
requirements_section:
znajomość Pyspark (min. 1 rok doświadczenia),
dobra znajomości języka Python (obszar przetwarzania danych),
biegła znajomości SQL,
umiejętności analityczne,
doświadczenie w pracy na danych typu: parquet, delta, xml, json, avro, csv,
doświadczenie w projektowaniu i budowaniu procesów przetwarzania danych.
optional_section:
doświadczenie w narzędziu Databricks,
doświadczenie w projektowaniu i budowie procesów ETL (SSIS, ADF, Synapse, Airflow),
znajomość baz danych: relacyjnych (PostgreSQL) i NoSQL (MongoDB),
znajomość usług Azure (Event-Hubs, Storage, Synapse).

wdrożenie automatycznych procesów monitorowania jakości danych.
requirements_section:
znajomość Pyspark (min. 1 rok doświadczenia),
dobra znajomości języka Python (obszar przetwarzania danych),
biegła znajomości SQL,
umiejętności analityczne,
doświadczenie w pracy na danych typu: parquet, delta, xml, json, avro, csv,
doświadczenie w projektowaniu i budowaniu procesów przetwarzania danych.
optional_section:
doświadczenie w narzędziu Databricks,
doświadczenie w projektowaniu i budowie procesów ETL (SSIS, ADF, Synapse, Airflow),
znajomość baz danych: relacyjnych (PostgreSQL) i NoSQL (MongoDB),
znajomość usług Azure (Event-Hubs, Storage, Synapse).

responsibilities_section:
Definiowanie potrzeb raportowych dla kadry zarządzającej
Przygotowywanie i prezentowanie analiz zawierających rekomendacje biznesowe
Pomoc w tworzeniu i automatyzacji raportów dla klientów biznesowych
Przygotowanie crossowych analiz na podstawie różnorodnych źródeł danych
Tworzenie raportów ad-hoc
Udział w projektach związanych z wdrażaniem nowych i rozwojem istniejących systemów zarządzania danymi
requirements_section:
Wykształcenie wyższe (preferowane z zakresu ekonomii, metody ilościowe w ekonomii i systemy informacyjne, matematyka i pokrewne)
Co najmniej dwa lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku
Umiejętność pracy z relacyjnymi bazami danych, potwierdzoną przynajmniej rocznym doświadczeniem na podobnym stanowisku w branży farmaceutycznej lub FMCG (warunek konieczny)
Biegła znajomość programu MS Office (szczególnie Excel, Power Query, VBA, Power Point)
Umiejętność programowania SQL
Podstawowa znajomość R, Python
Dobra znajomość programu Power BI
Podstawowa znajomość języka angielskiego
Wysokie umiejętności analityczne oraz komunikacyjne
Nastawienie na rozwiązanie problemów

position_name: Senior Network Engineer in Security Domain
optional_technologies:
Docker
VMware
Ansible
Cisco
Palo Alto Networks
Check Point
Blue Coat
responsibilities_section:
Implementation and migration of firewall configuration in the Customer’s security platform
Analysis of the customer’s network environment and creating migration workflow per each case study
Cooperation with the Development team on creating automation software for migrations
Work with the Customer to deliver a solution
Collaboration with the Customer to improve the existing automation framework
requirements_section:
Excellent knowledge of networks, network security and network platforms
Experience with Fortinet/FortiGate firewalls
Experience with configuring next-generation firewalls, routers and network management tools from various vendors
Experience with Python (at least with writing own scripts to automate daily and routine tasks and willing to seriously develop the programming skills)
Knowledge of Linux 7+ years of experience in Networks
Fluency in English (B2 level minimum)
Willingness to learn – you will face challenges that require creativity, individual solutions and teamwork
optional_section:
Knowledge of network security products from vendors like Palo Alto Networks, Check Point, Blue Coat, Cisco
Understanding of DevOps tools and practices
Hands-on experience with Docker, VMWare, Ansible
Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines
Understanding of best practices in enterprise network security
Experience with production grade deployments

responsibilities_section:
Implementation and migration of firewall configuration in the Customer’s security platform
Analysis of the customer’s network environment and creating migration workflow per each case study
Cooperation with the Development team on creating automation software for migrations
Work with the Customer to deliver a solution
Collaboration with the Customer to improve the existing automation framework
requirements_section:
Excellent knowledge of networks, network security and network platforms
Experience with Fortinet/FortiGate firewalls
Experience with configuring next-generation firewalls, routers and network management tools from various vendors
Experience with Python (at least with writing own scripts to automate daily and routine tasks and willing to seriously develop the programming skills)
Knowledge of Linux 7+ years of experience in Networks
Fluency in English (B2 level minimum)
Willingness to learn – you will face challenges that require creativity, individual solutions and teamwork
optional_section:
Knowledge of network security products from vendors like Palo Alto Networks, Check Point, Blue Coat, Cisco
Understanding of DevOps tools and practices
Hands-on experience with Docker, VMWare, Ansible
Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines
Understanding of best practices in enterprise network security
Experience with production grade deployments
